$-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$
$ this |      decimalNotNull |      decimalNull | offsetDateTimeNotNull      | offsetDateTimeNull      | portable      | valueString      $
$-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$
$ >    |           1.234E-53 |                - | 2023-04-05T12:33:45Z       | -                       | {value:foo}   | foobar           $
$-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$
